DeepClean¶

DeepClean is a multimodal data pre-processing and cleaning package written in python.

Features¶

  • Single package for multi modal data pre-processing and cleaning.

  • Fast Experimentation

  • Modularity in the data (processing) pipeline

  • Implements techniques like: - Normalization - Tokenization - Augmentation - Denoising - and much more.

Installation¶

pip install deepclean

Table of Contents¶

  • Getting Started
  • Modules
  • Examples

At a Glance¶

import deepclean.main.text as dctxt
normalizer = dctxt.Normalizer()
